data.comment: 3578 spectators are watching the match in Kobe.
The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in high up the field for Kobe in Kobe.
In the minute 3, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Kobe are whistled for offside.

Throw-in for Kobe close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Michael Olunga gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashiwa.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Kobe to check on Michael Olunga, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 10, Michael Olunga is back on his feet again.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
In Kobe Kashiwa attack through Ataru Esaka. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 11, Kobe have a goal kick.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Kobe in the half of Kashiwa.
Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 16, Yutaro Oda (Kobe) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kobe.
In the minute 18, Kobe's Thomas Vermaelen goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Ataru Esaka (Kashiwa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Kobe have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 20, Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kobe throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Kobe surge into the attack at Noevir Stadium but Dyanfrez Douglasâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.

Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Andres Iniesta for Kobe who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 23, The home team has substituted Andres Iniesta with Takuya Yasui. Thorsten Fink is thus making his first change.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Kobe, close to Kashiwa's area.
Free kick Kobe.
In the minute 29, Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
The home team have replaced Thomas Vermaelen with Hirofumi Watanabe. This is the second substitution made today by Thorsten Fink.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Kobe to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Kobe's Gotoku Sakai misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 37, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Kobe drives forward and Yutaro Oda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 43, Yutaro Oda for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
At Noevir Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first half has been concluded at Noevir Stadium.
Yuta Goke puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 45, Great play from Yutaro Oda to set up the goal.
The second-half is underway at Noevir Stadium.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
In the minute 46, Kashiwa make their first substitution with Matheus Savio replacing Yusuke Segawa.
Hayato Nakama scores with his head for Kashiwa to level the match at 1-1.
In the minute 46, That's a fine assist from Hiromu Mitsumaru.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 50, Hotaru Yamaguchi of Kobe gets in a strike, but is off target.

Free kick for Kobe in their own half.

Kobe pushes forward through Yuta Goke, whose finish on goal is saved.

Kobe are coming forward and Takuya Yasui gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.

Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kobe.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kobe just outside Kashiwa's area.
In the minute 60, Important block from the Kashiwa defence as Dyanfrez Douglas fires in a strike for Kobe.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kobe throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Gotoku Sakai of Kobe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 63, Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kashiwa's Matheus Savio breaks free at Noevir Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Kobe have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Kobe are pushing forward but Hotaru Yamaguchi's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Noevir Stadium.
Nelsinho Baptista is making the team's second substitution at Noevir Stadium with Masatoshi Mihara replacing Hidekazu Otani.
In the minute 65, Kengo Kitazume is replacing Shunki Takahashi for Kashiwa at Noevir Stadium.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 67, Kashiwa's Michael Olunga gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Matheus Savio for Kashiwa drives towards goal at Noevir Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Kashiwa.
Kobe's Takuya Yasui gets in a shot on goal at Noevir Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Sachiro Toshima is on a sub for Hayato Nakama for Kashiwa.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 76, In Kobe, Yuta Goke of Kobe is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Michael Olunga scores to make it 1-2 at Noevir Stadium.
Matheus Savio instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 78, Koichiro Fukushima awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Thorsten Fink (Kobe) is making a third substitution, with Kyogo Furuhashi replacing Yutaro Oda.
The home team have replaced So Fujitani with Keijiro Ogawa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Thorsten Fink.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Gotoku Sakai with Ryo Hatsuse.

Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.

Kobe's Yuta Goke is on target but unsuccessful.

Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.

Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Kobe's half.
Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 86, In Kobe Kobe drive forward through Dyanfrez Douglas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Kashiwa.
In the minute 88, Can Kobe capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Dyanfrez Douglas is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
That's a fine assist from Takuya Yasui.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Kobe push forward at Noevir Stadium and Keijiro Ogawa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kashiwa defence.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Kobe's Sergi Samper gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kashiwa defender.

Corner awarded to Kobe.

Koichiro Fukushima blows to end the match. The final score is 2-3.

Hiromu Mitsumaru with an assist there.
